node.html: A replication of the game Asteroids written in Haskell.
Another project to support TensorTrade, it gets the historical OHLCV data of a supported crypto exchange and converts it to a readible DataFrame.
Binance does not offer a trailing stop loss for spot trading, running this on a server with your API keys will make every stop loss a trailing stop loss.
A collection of all of the extras one can use when using TensorTrade.
